selections.name: Sweet Hesitation
selections.reason: Massive class drop from Metropolitan/Provincial grade (Eagle Farm/Sunshine Coast) to a Country BM58. Despite the top weight (61.5kg), her speed figures are superior to this field. Won 2 from 6 and has faced much tougher company.

selections.name: Tinkerbella
selections.reason: Drawn the rail (Barrier 1) which is gold over the 800m scamper at Warwick. Has placed in town and possesses the early speed to utilize the gate.

selections.name: Embolden
selections.reason: Resuming. Won a maiden over this trip at Kilcoy showing good speed. Drawn well to be competitive.

selections.name: Sleepy Joe
selections.reason: Consistent recent form including a win and a placing. Has race fitness on his side.

danger_horse.name: Tinkerbella
danger_horse.reason: The inside barrier advantage over 800m is significant; if she jumps cleanly she could lead all the way.

selections.name: Husson's Treasure
selections.reason: Resuming off a trial win at Beaudesert. Drawn Barrier 2 which is ideal for this short trip. Previous form includes a 2nd at Ipswich.

selections.name: Simba's Pride
selections.reason: Ran 2nd on debut at Toowoomba. Has the ability but the wide barrier (10) over 800m is the primary concern.

selections.name: Foxtrotting
selections.reason: First starter who showed promise with a 2nd in a Beaudesert trial. Watch betting moves.

selections.name: Lira
selections.reason: Experienced mare who has shown flashes of ability. Can run into the money in this weak field.

danger_horse.name: Simba's Pride
danger_horse.reason: Clearly has the talent to win based on debut, but must overcome the wide draw.

selections.name: Mr Encore
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Has competed in much higher grades (BM70/75). Resuming but has won first-up before. Even with weight, rates highest.

selections.name: Raiderlicious
selections.reason: Resuming. Won first-up last preparation. Drawn perfectly in Barrier 2 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Corvalist
selections.reason: Another resuming runner with decent fresh stats. Drawn well in Barrier 3.

selections.name: Lady Zaydi
selections.reason: Track specialist who has won here previously. Resuming and could sprint well fresh.

danger_horse.name: Raiderlicious
danger_horse.reason: Map advantage from Barrier 2 could be the difference if the top weight gets caught wide.

selections.name: Summer Ready
selections.reason: Coming off a solid 2nd at Beaudesert. Drawn well in Barrier 3 and looks ready to break through.

selections.name: Kobability
selections.reason: Drops in class from Metro/Provincial maidens. Placed at Doomben three starts back. Strong contender.

selections.name: Powerful Warrior
selections.reason: Consistent maiden performer with multiple placings. Will be running on.

selections.name: Yes Donald Yes
selections.reason: Ran 4th on debut at this track. Should improve with experience and drawn well.

danger_horse.name: Kobability
danger_horse.reason: Has the best form lines (Metro placings) if she can bring that to Warwick.

selections.name: Meltdown
selections.reason: Last start winner at Sunshine Coast. Drawn the rails (Barrier 1) and looks to have found peak form. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Linwar
selections.reason: Dominant 3.5L maiden winner last start. Progressive type who can handle the step up in grade.

selections.name: Vacillation
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. Has to overcome a wider draw but is in winning form.

selections.name: Key Component
selections.reason: Consistent mare knocking on the door. Placed 2nd last start at Ipswich.

danger_horse.name: Linwar
danger_horse.reason: The manner of the last win suggests there is more to come.

selections.name: Cardiologist
selections.reason: Consistent galloper who ran 2nd last start. Drawn perfectly in Barrier 3 to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Sukhbir
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start at Beaudesert. Rates well in this field.

selections.name: Powerful Eagle
selections.reason: Drops in class from BM70 to BM65. Top weight but has the class edge.

selections.name: Turn Me Royale
selections.reason: Resuming. Has ability but the barrier draw (if he runs here) is a major negative.

danger_horse.name: Sukhbir
danger_horse.reason: Proven at this level and is fit.

selections.name: Bole Le
selections.reason: Ran 2nd last start at Toowoomba. Drawn well in Barrier 5 and looks the one to beat in this 0-55 grade.

selections.name: Miss Highfalutin
selections.reason: Won her maiden at this track. Light weight but drawn wide.

selections.name: Butwedid
selections.reason: Coming off a maiden win. Confidence is up and drawn reasonably well.

selections.name: Doitlikemaxwell
selections.reason: Consistent form (3rd last start) but the horror barrier (20) makes it tough.

danger_horse.name: Miss Highfalutin
danger_horse.reason: Track winner who could surprise if she can overcome the draw.
